name: Soil Mates
description:
In this fantasy world, darkness is slowly taking over, manifesting as despair and consuming those who fall into it. But hope still remains, take on the roles of a human and a plant, working together to outrun the darkness and reach the mountaintop where it must be planted to push back the shadows.

In this side-scrolling cooperative plat-former, players must use their unique abilities to navigate through different obstacles and challenges. The human player runs, dashes and throws mushroom bombs while the plant player creates platforms, throws vines, and damages enemies. Cooperation is key to success as players must work together to overcome obstacles that require their complementary abilities.

But beware, the darkness is always chasing you, and each time you are consumed by it, you lose happiness points. Lose too many and your journey comes to a tragic end.

Can you outrun the darkness, evade enemies and reach the mountaintop in this exciting and challenging adventure? Play with a friend to find out!

Now featuring an exclusive Secret Hat Mode!
